sentences.english: Teachers will be asked to fill in a questionnaire.

sentences.chinese: 由于这个地区的交通流量有所增加，居民都在抱怨。

sentences.chinese: “你什么事都不问问我的看法。”罗德抱怨道。

sentences.chinese: 18％的30岁的人声称他们是工作狂。

sentences.chinese: 我忘记打开防盗警报器了。

sentences.chinese: 我们不明白是什么吓着他了。

sentences.chinese: 之后火警响了，我只抓起衣服就跑了出去。

sentences.chinese: 她为西雅图市区的一家法律事务所撰写法律文件。

sentences.chinese: 你现在不能打电话给她，都过午夜了！

sentences.chinese: 他到的时候早已经是后半夜了。

sentences.chinese: 他很容易感到厌烦。

sentences.chinese: 过了一会儿，我觉得无聊，就走了。

sentences.chinese: 克劳福德强调市中心需要建更多的住宅。

sentences.chinese: 她强调了均衡饮食的重要性。

sentences.chinese: 在纳什维尔的一间录音室

sentences.chinese: …一位瑜伽专家。

sentences.chinese: 至少他死得突然，没有遭罪。

sentences.chinese: 他们正在向民众施加压力，要求他们投赞成票。

sentences.chinese: 州长宣布了一项降低犯罪率的新计划。

sentences.chinese: 她更喜欢喝黑咖啡。

sentences.chinese: 看来我们只能站着——没有座位了。

sentences.chinese: 她站在门口。

sentences.chinese: 大部分救援工作都由志愿人员完成。

sentences.chinese: 这笔款项扣除一小笔服务费后将退还给你。

sentences.chinese: 洗脸盆

sentences.chinese: 在盆里装入蛋糕拌料。

sentences.chinese: 他们激将他，说他不可能在1小时内擦洗40辆汽车。

sentences.chinese: 这项法案得到参议院绝大多数人的支持。

sentences.english: We strongly support the peace process.
sentences.chinese: 我们大力拥护和平进程。

detailed_translations.english: something that presses on something else to hold it up or in position

sentences.chinese: 她手表上的夜光表面显示时间为1点20分。

sentences.chinese: 这座塔楼是吉尔伯特·斯科特设计的。

sentences.chinese: 他们在《晨报》上刊登了一则启事，出高薪寻找合适的人选。

sentences.chinese: 音乐会筹办者在《纽约时报》上刊登了整版广告。

sentences.chinese: 只有寥寥数人对该广告作出了回应。

sentences.chinese: 颁奖仪式

sentences.chinese: 埃文斯博士感谢他来颁奖。

sentences.english: Charlie thinks money will solve all his problems.
sentences.chinese: 查理认为钱能解决他所有的问题。

sentences.chinese: 解数学方程式的尝试

sentences.chinese: 老板把一名会计师从在职人员名单中除了名。

sentences.chinese: 会计及时卡住了这笔不必要的开支。

sentences.chinese: 他们与会计商量有关预算提案的事。

sentences.chinese: 一管牙膏

detailed_translations.chinese: 使成管状；把…装管；用管输送

sentences.chinese: 拥挤的房间

sentences.english: a crowded street
sentences.chinese: 拥挤的街道

sentences.english: The train was very crowded, and we had to stand.
sentences.chinese: 火车很挤，我们只好站着。

detailed_translations.english: too full of people or things

sentences.chinese: 露西当时住在附近的汉密尔顿镇。

sentences.english: He might easily have been seen by someone who lived nearby.
sentences.chinese: 他可能很容易被住在附近的人看到。

sentences.chinese: 直升机坠毁在附近的地面上。

sentences.chinese: 他除了累身体很好。

sentences.chinese: 我能听见远处车流的声音，除此之外，一切都很安静。

sentences.chinese: 天气预报说明天是晴天。

sentences.chinese: 预报周末有雨。

sentences.chinese: 主广场上聚集了一大群人。

sentences.chinese: 她穿梭在宾客中间和他们打招呼。

detailed_translations.english: You use ought to have with a past participle to indicate that although it was best or correct for someone to do something in the past, they did not actually do it.

sentences.english: The U.S. is contributing $4 billion in loans, credits, and grants.
sentences.chinese: 美国以信贷和赠与的方式捐助了40亿美元。

sentences.english: Local businesses have agreed to contribute.
sentences.chinese: 当地的公司已经同意捐助了。

detailed_translations.english: To contribute money or resources to something means to give money or resources to help pay for something or to help achieve a particular purpose

sentences.english: Greek yoghurt
sentences.chinese: 希腊式酸奶

detailed_translations.english: relating to Greece, its people, or its language
someone from Greece

sentences.english: a hat with a high crown
sentences.chinese: 高顶帽

detailed_translations.english: the top part of a hat or someone’s head
to place a crown on the head of a new king or queen as part of an official ceremony in which they become king or queen

sentences.english: little girls with ribbons in their hair
sentences.chinese: 头发上系着丝带的小姑娘们

sentences.chinese: 一捆用淡蓝色丝带扎好的信

sentences.chinese: 剪彩后，新车站正式开始运营。

sentences.english: He walked with her, linking arms (= putting his arm around her arm ).
sentences.chinese: 他与她挽臂同行。

detailed_translations.english: to join two things by putting one through the other
each ring of a chain

sentences.english: ‘Goodbye,’ carolled Boris happily.
sentences.chinese: “再见。”鲍里斯愉快地说道。

detailed_translations.chinese: 欢乐地歌唱；唱耶诞颂歌

detailed_translations.english: a traditional Christmas song

sentences.english: I want you stuffed in my stocking.
sentences.chinese: 我只要你塞在我的袜子里。

sentences.english: The Christmas stocking bulged with goodies.
sentences.chinese: 圣诞节袜子里塞满了好吃的东西。

sentences.english: She ran her silk stocking on a nail last night.
sentences.chinese: 她昨天夜晚丝袜被钉子钩住，抽了丝。

sentences.english: Something was seriously wrong .
sentences.chinese: 出大问题了。

sentences.english: It’s time we talked seriously about our relationship.
sentences.chinese: 我们该认真谈一谈我们的关系了。

detailed_translations.english: very much or to a great degree

sentences.english: a telephone pole
sentences.chinese: 电话线杆

detailed_translations.english: a long stick or post usually made of wood or metal, often set upright in the ground to support something
to push a boat along in the water using a pole

sentences.english: envelopes and stamps
sentences.chinese: 信封和邮票

sentences.english: She tore open the envelope and frantically read the letter.
sentences.chinese: 她撕开信封慌忙看信。

sentences.english: He got a job stuffing envelopes (= filling them with letters ) at the campaign headquarters.
sentences.chinese: 他找了一份在竞选总部装信封的工作。

detailed_translations.english: a thin paper cover in which you put and send a letter

sentences.english: There was a calendar on the wall above, with large squares around the dates.
sentences.chinese: 墙的上方曾有一本日历，日期框在大方格里。

sentences.english: The Christian calendar was originally based on the Julian calendar of the Romans.
sentences.chinese: 公历最初是基于罗马的儒略历的。

detailed_translations.english: a set of pages that show the days, weeks, and months of a particular year, that you usually hang on a wall

sentences.english: They're putting new street signs up.
sentences.chinese: 他们正在张贴新的路标。

sentences.english: Christmas decorations
sentences.chinese: 圣诞节装饰物

sentences.chinese: 蛋糕上的裱花

sentences.chinese: 巧克力布丁

sentences.english: These bras are specially designed for women with large breasts.
sentences.chinese: 这些胸罩专为乳房丰满的女性设计。

sentences.chinese: 母乳

sentences.english: breast cancer
sentences.chinese: 乳腺癌

sentences.chinese: 迪克把她的照片轻轻拥在胸前。

detailed_translations.english: one of the two round raised parts on a woman’s chest that produce milk when she has a baby

sentences.english: He swallowed the last of his coffee and asked for the bill.
sentences.chinese: 他喝完最后一口咖啡，要求结账。

sentences.english: Most snakes swallow their prey whole .
sentences.chinese: 大多数蛇都是把猎物囫囵吞下。

detailed_translations.english: to make food or drink go down your throat and towards your stomach

sentences.english: Some children find it difficult to talk to adults.
sentences.chinese: 一些孩子觉得与大人很难谈得来。

sentences.english: an adult lion
sentences.chinese: 一头成年的狮子

detailed_translations.english: a fully-grown person, or one who is considered to be legally responsible for their actions
fully grown or developed

sentences.english: The assistant carried on talking.
sentences.chinese: 那个助理接着谈了下去。

sentences.english: Her bravery has given him the will to carry on with his life and his work.
sentences.chinese: 她的勇气激发了他继续生活和工作下去的意愿。

sentences.english: His eldest son Joseph carried on his father's traditions.
sentences.chinese: 长子约瑟夫继承了他父亲的传统。

detailed_translations.english: If you carry on doing something, you continue to do it

sentences.english: He marched off, whistling a merry tune.
sentences.chinese: 他吹着一首欢快的曲子大步走了。

detailed_translations.chinese: 愉快的；微醉的；嬉戏作乐的
detailed_translations.english: used to say that you hope someone will have a happy time at Christmas

sentences.english: That model won't go into production before late 2007.
sentences.chinese: 那种型号要到2007年底才会投入生产。

sentences.chinese: 石油和天然气产量的下降

detailed_translations.english: the process of making or growing things to be sold, especially in large quantities

sentences.english: She carried hypodermic needles and syringes in her bag.
sentences.chinese: 她包里带着皮下注射针和针筒。

sentences.english: Drug users are at risk when they share needles.
sentences.chinese: 吸毒者共用注射针很危险。

detailed_translations.english: a very thin, pointed steel tube at the end of a syringe, which is pushed into your skin to put a drug or medicine into your body or to take out blood

sentences.english: I’ll be asleep as soon as my head hits the pillow.
sentences.chinese: 我头一碰到枕头就会睡着。

detailed_translations.english: a cloth bag filled with soft material that you put your head on when you are sleeping

sentences.english: She can play tennis as well as basketball.
sentences.chinese: 她也会打篮球，也会打网球。

detailed_translations.english: in addition to sb/sth; too

sentences.english: Wipe your feet on the mat.
sentences.chinese: 在地垫上蹭蹭你的鞋底。

detailed_translations.english: a small piece of thick rough material which covers part of a floor
to tangle or weave or become tangled or woven into a dense mass

sentences.english: the Ford’s 2.8 litre engine
sentences.chinese: 福特汽车2.8升排量的引擎

detailed_translations.chinese: [计量] 公升（米制容量单位）
detailed_translations.english: the basic unit for measuring liquid in the metric system

sentences.english: So when you fry, bake, grill, or roast potatoes you could be generating potentially harmful carcinogens.
sentences.chinese: 因此当你油炸、烘烤、烧烤或者炒土豆时，有可能会产生有害的致癌物。

detailed_translations.english: the young of various species of fish
to cook something in hot fat or oil, or to be cooked in hot fat or oil

sentences.english: Unfortunately, you were out when we called.
sentences.chinese: 很遗憾，我们来的时候你出去了。

detailed_translations.english: used when you are mentioning a fact that you wish was not true

sentences.english: What a mess!
sentences.chinese: 太乱了！

sentences.english: Sorry – the place is a bit of a mess .
sentences.chinese: 对不起——这里有些乱。

sentences.english: When I got home, the house was a complete mess .
sentences.chinese: 我回到家时，屋子里一片狼藉。

sentences.english: You can make cookies if you promise not to make a mess in the kitchen.
sentences.chinese: 如果你答应不把厨房搞得乱七八糟，你可以去做甜饼。

sentences.english: She hates mess.
sentences.chinese: 她讨厌到处乱糟糟的。

detailed_translations.chinese: 凌乱状态，混乱的局面；困境
detailed_translations.english: if there is a mess somewhere or a place is a mess, things there are dirty or not neatly arranged

detailed_translations.chinese: 弄糟， 弄脏， 搞乱
detailed_translations.english: to make something look untidy or dirty
